com.dropoutdesign.ddf
Class LocalFloor

java.lang.Object
  com.dropoutdesign.ddf.DanceFloor
      com.dropoutdesign.ddf.LocalFloor
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReliableLocalFloor
public class LocalFloor
extends DanceFloor

A locally connected floor. Allows inspection and control of a dance floor attached to this physical machine, generally via usb-serial.

Constructor Detail

LocalFloor

public LocalFloor(java.lang.String confFile)
           throws java.io.IOException
Create a floor described by the configuration xml file of the given name.

Parameters:
confFile - the name of the file containing configuration data.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - the file could not be read or is malformed.

LocalFloor

public LocalFloor(DanceFloorConfig config)
Create a floor described by the given configuration object. The configuration data is used to specify the size, layout, and connection of the floor's component modules.

Method Detail

             throws ModuleIOException
Connect to the floor. Will return sucessfully if at least one module is connected.
